charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1101_010:
One day, while out for a walk in the forest,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] found Morty deep
in contemplation.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1101_020:
Just as [Name:PlayerNickname ] was
wondering whether to say hello...
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_0401_050:
Oh, hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Didn’t mean to startle you.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_0402_070:
Oh, hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Didn’t mean to startle you.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_080:
I was training myself to detect Drifblim when he’s
hiding his presence.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_090:
It’s something we practice often back at the
Ecruteak Gym. I just close my eyes and try to
sense where he is.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_100:
It’s part of my training to become a truly powerful
Trainer—the kind spoken of in Ecruteak’s tales
of yore.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_110:
I believed in those tales, so I have secretly trained
in the Ecruteak Gym all my life.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_120:
Every now and then, I’d leave Ecruteak City and
visit other places, but always with the ultimate
goal of furthering my training!
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_0401_140:
Yeah. Which might explain why I’ve always
wanted to be more like Drifblim—just drifting
without a care wherever the wind takes me.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_0402_160:
Yeah. Which might explain why I’ve always
wanted to be more like Drifblim—just drifting
without a care wherever the wind takes me.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_170: At first, I was caught off guard by how free he is.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_180: But now, I can’t imagine being without him!
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_0301_190: You two sure get along well!
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_0401_200: We do! But I’m hoping we’ll grow even closer.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_0302_210: What a great pair you make!
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_0402_220: Thanks! But I’m hoping we’ll grow even closer.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_230:
Back at my Gym, there are Pokémon that have
been with me even longer than Drifblim has—like
my Gengar, for instance.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_240:
But I decided to enter the PML with Drifblim so
we could get to know each other better.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_250:
Coming to Pasio has given us the chance to
meet you and other interesting sync pairs, not
to mention see whole new landscapes.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_260: Travel and adventure impart valuable life lessons.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_270:
There are some things you’ll never get to see
unless you get out there and travel...
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_280:
but on the other hand, there are some things you
can only see by being a Gym Leader and taking
on challengers!
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_290:
In fact, I’d say there are pearls of wisdom
everywhere that can steer you toward being
a true Trainer!
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_300: And not just in battle, but in everyday life, too!
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_310:
I hope deepening my bond with Drifblim will help
me find those pearls of wisdom!
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_320:
Aha! Sounds like Drifblim and I are on the
same page!
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_330:
I’ve been closely observing the bond you’ve
formed with your partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_340:
As a Gym Leader, I’d love to face you in a serious
battle someday.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_350:
I can’t wait for the day you finally come knocking
on the Ecruteak Gym’s door!
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_0401_370:
Excellent! When the time comes, I’ll meet you
head on with all my power!
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_0402_390:
Excellent! When the time comes, I’ll meet you
head on with all my power!
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_400:
Some say that souls are what give Drifblim the
energy it uses to fly.
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_410:
Well, what gives ME the energy to fly is...my
years of training and the experience I’ve gained
from facing so many challengers!
charaepi_ch0148_00_matsuba/2301_1201_420:
When you’re ready to pit your experience against
ours, Drifblim and I will be waiting!
